text: @WhiteHouse They are a communist country,  and they have 2 billion people. They have more scientists than we have citizens . And manufacture all the PPE they could ever need.  Also  @realDonaldTrump  calling Covid19 “China Virus” didn’t help. #WorstPresidentEver #TrumpVirus2020 https://t.co/P0bOv8155G
